useCase.name: Send Overdue Book Reminders
useCase.description: Notify borrowers about overdue book returns.

mainSequence.step: Web Interface queries the database for overdue books.
Database returns a list of overdue books to the Web Interface.
Web Interface displays the list of overdue books to the Librarian.
Librarian requests the Web Interface to send reminders to borrowers.
Web Interface triggers the Notification System to send overdue notices.
Notification System looks up borrower contact information in the database.
Database returns the contact information to the Notification System.
Notification System confirms to the Librarian that notifications have been sent.
